thread.title: Ticket Service Executive - Pro Sports

title: Ticket Service Executive - Pro Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Ticket Service Executive Posted/Updated: 10-20-2015 Brief Job Description: The position will be responsible for managing current and new full season ticket accounts. The position will be expected to handle 300-400 accounts and provide proactive customer service.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
